title: tobi4255
author: tobi4255
content: The whole panorama that Oasis is visioning is critical yet the steady phase path is on its pace. Cipher and Sapphire have proven remarkable results. Cipher being the ParaTime implantation of TEEs assuring the confidential smart contracts being private, turning the whole blockchain more secure and private.On the other hand, Sapphire is more like an IDE for solidity developers with built-in Confidential EVM ParaTime. While it’s launched the new craze has been determined to be the Confidential NFTs which are able to withhold data from numeric to genomic. The safety and confidentiality alignment goes on and on. Oasis hopes to give the future world a protected connection with propelling of Web3 by blockchain.

comments.author: blogclaim
comments.body: What's the use-case of the oasis network?

comments.author: tobi4255
comments.body: Quote from: blogclaim on August 25, 2022, 03:22:38 PMWhat's the use-case of the oasis network?Oasis is continually improving its services to benefit its growing community of users.here are some of the contributors of Oasis’ ecosystem:1) Grant Program2) $235 Million Ecosystem Fund3) DeFi Projects 4) NFTs

comments.author: Wintersoldier
comments.body: Quote from: blogclaim on August 25, 2022, 03:22:38 PMWhat's the use-case of the oasis network?It's a Blockchain that aims to make use of Web3 to it's fullest, they want to take privacy on the Internet to the next level by having layers called Consensus layer and ParaTime layer. You can read more about them in their website and Medium.https://oasisprotocol.org/technologyhttps://medium.com/oasis-protocol-project
